message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000.  It's a great deal for you, as you know it's worth $15,000. Let's see if we can make this work!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Can you meet me halfway?
Bob, I appreciate your offer but $9,000 is simply too low. I'm willing to come down to $10,500.  This is a fair price considering the value you place on the product. Let's close this deal!
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $10,500 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so how about $10,250?
